official_title: A bill to amend the Safe Drinking Water Act to reauthorize and extend provisions relating to contaminant prevention detection, and response.
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control

summary.text: Drinking Water Security Act of 2005 - Amends the Safe Drinking Water Act to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to report to Congress on progress in and impediments to implementing methods to prevent, detect, and respond to the intentional introduction of chemical, biological or radiological contaminants into community water systems. Directs the Administrator to develop and carry out an implementation plan for FY2006-FY2010.
